title: Did the Obama Department of Justice force the FBI to remove 500,000 fugitives from the background check database?
subtitle: A decision taken by the Ministry of Justice during the Obama era and implemented during the Trump era prompted criticism from both parties as it had an impact on the national background verification system.
author: David Emery
vclaim: A decision by the Ministry of Justice under Obama forced the FBI to remove the names of 500,000 fugitives from the firearms procurement background check database.
